schools.name: George Washington Univ Sch Of Med

reviewDetails.comment: Very knowledgeable and have experience. Excellent in listening and very caring.

Dr. Balzora is a great GI. She has expertise, knowledge and communication skills. This is greatly appreciated in a specialist. She listens and asks questions. Her examination and communication with me during my last situation helped me to understand what was happening and medically I came to a successful resolution. I found her to give the same treatment whether it was routine or there was a problem. Compassion.

I have been having stomach issues for some time. Dr. Balzora has been extremely thorough in testing for all possible causes. It has taken some time to get to the bottom of my issue, but she was determined to help me. She has an amazing personality and even better “bed side” manners. Top ratings for her!!!

I have seen Dr. Balzora three times over the last several weeks and have nothing but good things to say about her and the team that supports her practice.  Very professional and knowledgeable but approachable at the same time.  Excellent bedside manner.
Personable and thorough.
She is terrific!
Good doctor,

participatingProducts.description: Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus
Open Access Plus, OA Plus, ChoiceFund OA Plus with CareLink

schools.name: Ross University School Of Medicine, Roseau

reviewDetails.comment:
I became patient of doctor Patel in the end of last year. I had severe pain attack in my back, but as a new patient wasn't able to arrange appointment with doctor Patel immediately, so he started diagnostics and sent me to physical therapy sessions when pain subsided. We agreed that as his patient in next time I have pain attack, I will be admitted in more reasonable time. I have pain attack now, tried to arrange appointment with him ASAP, but I was told next available date is in three weeks time. I tried to remind them about our agreement for timely admission, they said, ok, you can go today at 2:30. But in few minutes called me back and said they couldn't admit me and suggested to come after three weeks.

I cannot consider this doctor neither reliable nor professional one. And do not recommend anyone to use his services

reviewDetails.comment: Best doctor in the city. She goes out of her way to make sure my concerns are treated and answers any question I have. My husband and I both go to her for different reasons and she’s amazing to us both.
Very good bedside manner, thorough and takes her time getting to the root of the problem. Highly recommended.

reviewDetails.comment:
Dr. Wolf and his whole staff were amazing!
They were attentive, compassionate, and informative. They exemplify what every hospital experience should be like. I would highly recommend.
Knowledgeable and caring.
Excellent initial consultation with Dr. Wolff. The appointment started on time and he was incredibly attentive and thorough. Very efficient and professional operation.

He is a terrific doctor, thorough and exudes a caring personality.
Best, [PERSONAL INFO]

reviewDetails.comment: Dr. Dao is fantastic! Spends a lot of time with patients asking all the right questions, patient and thoughtful- great communicator.
It was a good first visit. She was thorough and addressed my concerns.

Dr.Dao took the time to explain each and every part of my physical, from heart rate to listening to my lungs. Dr.Dao was on-time, gave great answers to my questions, made me feel heard, and provided a referral when I requested help for a chronic stress injury. I am very happy to have found a new PCP and plan on being a patient of Dr.Dao for years to come!
wonderful service.

reviewDetails.comment:
Dr. Cohen was extremely knowledgeable. I did not feel rushed. He outlined several treatment options.
definitely recommend.

He takes the time to listen and gives serious consideration to medical issues.  I found him to be patient, to explain things in a comprehensible manner, and to make sure I understood what I was being told.
Very smart doctor.

reviewDetails.comment: He was knowledgeable and efficient
wrong diagnosis
Dr Seidenberg was wonderful! He made me feel very much at ease and was very personable and professional.

Great Doctor, was even kind enough to make time to see me again without an appointment as I was in the area. 
I had been to several doctors before hand to solve my problem and he was the only one that managed to sort it out.

Did not listen to me when I told him I knew I had a serious issue. He told me I was allergic to the sun. Come to find out from another dermatologist that I have a contagious skin condition. I suffered for 7 weeks.
Yes I would, he is very pleasant and thorough and knowledgeable and honest.
